errorBoundary.title: Errore critico

masterPassword.intro2: Inserisci una <1>password generale</1> per criptare le chiavi private dei tuoi portafogli. Saranno salvati nel tuo browser e ti sarà chiesto di inserire la password generale per decriptarle ogni sessione.
masterPassword.errorPasswordUnset: La password generale non è stata ancora impostata.
masterPassword.popoverDescription: Inserisci la tua password generale per decriptare i portafogli.
masterPassword.popoverDescriptionEncrypt: Inserisci la tua password generale per criptare e decriptare i portafogli.
masterPassword.forcedAuthWarning: Sei entrato automaticamente da un'impostazione di debug non sicura.
masterPassword.earlyAuthError: L'applicazione non è stata caricata completamente, ricarica per favore.

reset.description: Sei sicuro di voler reimpostare la password generale? Tutti i tuoi portafogli saranno eliminati. Assicurati di <3>esportare un backup prima!
reset.description2: Sei DAVVERO sicuro di voler ELIMINARE TUTTI I PORTAFOGLI?

addWallet.errorWalletLimitDescription: Non puoi aggiungere ulteriori portafogli al momento.

dashboard.inDevBanner: Welcome to the KromerWeb v2 private beta! This site is still in development, so most features are currently missing. Please report all bugs on <1>GitHub</1>. Thanks!
dashboard.inDevBanner2: Welcome to the KromerWeb v2 public beta! This site is relatively new, so please report any bugs on <1>GitHub</1>. Thanks!
dashboard.transactionsError: È stato riscontrato un errore durante il recupero delle transazioni. Vedi la console per i dettagli.
dashboard.blockValueEmptyDescription: Il valore del blocco aumenta quando dei <1>nomi</1> vengono acquistati.
dashboard.blockDifficultyError: È stato riscontrato un errore durante il recupero della difficoltà del blocco. Vedi la console per i dettagli.
dashboard.blockDifficultyHashRateTooltip: Stima della velocità di mining di hash combinata sulla rete, basata sul lavoro attuale.
dashboard.motdDebugMode: Questo server di sviluppo è non è ufficiale. I saldi e le transazioni possono essere manipolati. Procedi con cautela.

tips.0: Check out what's new in Krist and KromerWeb on the [What's New page](/whatsnew)!
tips.1: You can quickly navigate through tables with the arrow keys on desktop.
tips.2: You can click on table headers to sort them.
tips.3: You can filter by categories in the [My Wallets](/wallets) page by clicking the filter icon in the table header.
tips.4: The [settings page](/settings) has many advanced options to personalise your KromerWeb experience.
tips.5: Generate pre-filled transaction links with the new [Request page](/request).
tips.7: Quickly search the Krist network with the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+K (Cmd+K on macOS).
tips.8: Add contacts in the [address book](/contacts) to quickly send them transactions.
tips.9: A 'bumped' transaction is a transaction sent to and from the same address.
tips.10: The 'block difficulty' chart can be shown with a logarithmic scale to see small changes easier at lower difficulties.
tips.1-status: You are connected to an unofficial server. Your wallet passwords may be sent to the operator, who can use them to access your wallets on the official server. Please ask a question <1>here</1> for more information.
tips.11: The date format can be changed in the [advanced settings](/settings).
tips.12: You can see the [lowest mined block hashes](/network/blocks/lowest).
tips.13: The most recently purchased names can be seen on the [Network Names page](/network/names/new).
tips.14: The block value increases when [names](/network/names) are purchased.
tips.15: If you're worried about accidental transactions, you can enable a confirmation prompt in the [advanced settings](/settings).

credits.title: Crediti
credits.supportersDescription: Questo progetto è stato reso possibile grazie a questi fantastici sostenitori:
credits.translatorsDescription: Questo progetto è stato tradotto da questo fantastici contributori:

privacy.kristServerDesc: Le uniche informazioni private che il <1>Server Krist</1> salva sono il tuo indirizzo IP, User-Agent del Browser e Origin, come parte dei log del webserver. Queste informazioni sono automaticamente eliminate dopo 30 giorni.
privacy.kristwebDesc1: KromerWeb utilizza un server di <1>Sentry</1> improprio per la segnalazione automatica di errori. Questo sistema salva il tuo indirizzo IP, User-Agent del browser, Origin, breadcrumbs, ed i dettagli di qualsiasi errore che viene automaticamente segnalato. Queste informazioni sono automaticamente eliminate dopo 30 giorni.
privacy.kristwebDesc2: If you have an ad-blocking or tracker-blocking extension such as <1>uBlock Origin (recommended), our Sentry system is already blocked by the built-in lists, so you do not have to worry about your privacy. You can also opt-out of error reporting in the <4>settings page. That said, if you’d like to help us by providing more detailed error reports, then please consider making an exception for KromerWeb in your tracker blocker software. This site does not serve ads.
privacy.kristwebDesc3: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the developers.

settings.title: Impostazioni
settings.autoRefreshTablesDescription: Whether or not large table listings (e.g. transactions, names) should automatically refresh when a change is detected on the network.
settings.alwaysIncludeMined: Always include mined transactions in transaction listings (may require refresh)
settings.addressCopyButtons: Show copy buttons next to all addresses
settings.nameCopyButtons: Show copy buttons next to all names
settings.blockHashCopyButtons: Show copy buttons next to all block hashes
settings.showRelativeDates: Show relative dates instead of absolute ones if recent
settings.showRelativeDatesDescription: Everywhere on the site, if a date is less than 7 days ago, it will show as a relative date instead.
settings.showNativeDates: Show dates in a native date format from the language
settings.showNativeDatesDescription: If disabled, dates will always be shown as YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm:ss
settings.transactionsHighlightOwn: Highlight own transactions in the transactions table
settings.transactionsHighlightVerified: Highlight verified addresses in the transactions table
settings.transactionDefaultRaw: Default to the 'Raw' tab instead of 'CommonMeta' on the transaction page
settings.confirmTransactions: Prompt for confirmation for all transactions
settings.clearTransactionForm: Clear the Send Transaction form after clicking 'Send'
settings.sendTransactionDelay: Time to wait, in milliseconds, before allowing another transaction to be sent
settings.defaultPageSize: Default page size for table listings
settings.tableHotkeys: Enable table navigation hotkeys (left and right arrows)
settings.messageOnErrorReport: Show a notification when an error is automatically reported (requires refresh)

translations.errorMissingLanguages: The languages.json file seems to be missing. Was KromerWeb compiled correctly?

export.description: This secret code contains your wallets and address book contacts. You can use it to import them in another browser, or to back them up. You will still need your master password to import the wallets in the future. <1>Do not share this code with anyone.</1>

contactLimitMessage: You have more contacts stored than KromerWeb supports. This was either caused by a bug, or you bypassed it intentionally. Expect issues with syncing.

legacyMigration.description:
Welcome to KromerWeb v2! It looks like you have used KromerWeb v1 on this domain before.

Please enter your master password to migrate your wallets to the new format. You will only have to do this once.
legacyMigration.errorUnknown: An unknown error occurred. See console for details.

forgotPassword.modalContent: If you forgot your master password for KromerWeb v1, then you will not be able to migrate your wallets. You will never be asked again. Are you sure you want to skip migration?
